attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2003-1824

Date: 2003-11-19

                  Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Minister of Natural Resources, pursuant to subsection 21.1(1) of the National Energy Board Act, hereby approves the issuance by the National Energy Board to Cargill Gas Marketing Ltd., of Amending Orders AO-6-GL-102, AO-3-GL-110, AO-3-GL-121, AO-5-GL-122, AO-3-GL-128, AO-3-GL-141, AO-3-GL-163, AO-3-GL-172, AO-3-GL-175, AO-3-GL-200, AO-3-GL-242, AO-3-GL-244, AO-3-GL-245 and AO-3-GL-246 copies of which are attached to this Order.

 

 

 

 


                  Sur recommandation du ministre des Ressources naturelles et en vertu du paragraphe 21.1(1) de la Loi sur l’Office national de l’énergie, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil agrée la délivrance à Cargill Gas Marketing Ltd., par l’Office national de l’énergie, des ordonnances modificatrices AO-6-GL-102, AO-3-GL-110, AO-3-GL-121, AO-5-GL-122, AO-3-GL-128, AO-3-GL-141, AO-3-GL-163, AO-3-GL-172, AO-3-GL-175, AO-3-GL-200, AO-3-GL-242, AO-3-GL-244, AO-3-GL-245 et AO-3-GL-246, ci-jointes.
attachmentText: PC Number: 2003-1824Date: 2003-11-19                     Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,  on the recommendation of the Minister of Natural Resources, pursuant to subsection 21.1(1) of the National Energy Board Act, hereby approves the issuance by the National Energy Board to Cargill Gas Marketing Ltd., of Amending Orders AO-6-GL-102, AO-3-GL-110, AO-3-GL-121, AO-5-GL-122, AO-3-GL-128, AO-3-GL-141, AO-3-GL-163, AO-3-GL-172, AO-3-GL-175, AO-3-GL-200, AO-3-GL-242, AO-3-GL-244, AO-3-GL-245 and AO-3-GL-246 copies of which are attached to this Order.                            Sur recommandation du ministre des Ressources naturelles et en vertu du paragraphe 21.1(1) de la Loi sur l’Office national de l’énergie, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil agrée la délivrance à Cargill Gas Marketing Ltd., par l’Office national de l’énergie, des ordonnances modificatrices AO-6-GL-102, AO-3-GL-110, AO-3-GL-121, AO-5-GL-122, AO-3-GL-128, AO-3-GL-141, AO-3-GL-163, AO-3-GL-172, AO-3-GL-175, AO-3-GL-200, AO-3-GL-242, AO-3-GL-244, AO-3-GL-245 et AO-3-GL-246, ci-jointes.
